title: #140: Keep A Breast - Breast Cancer: Self Checks, Early Detection, and How To Be Preventative
itunes:title: #140: Keep A Breast - Breast Cancer: Self Checks, Early Detection, and How To Be Preventative
description:
On this episode we sit down with Shaney Jo Darden who is the founder and CCO of the Keep A Breast Foundation. We discuss breast cancer and how to perform self checks. We discuss early detection and how to take preventative measures.

To learn more about the Keep A Breast Foundation click HERE

To connect with Lauryn Evarts click HERE
